title: Twisted Fate
body:
Hi,

I like playing Twisted Fate in ranked and I enjoy playing him, I sometimes do average,good and bad, but most of the time when I pick Twisted Fate someone on my team will type "OMG DON'T GO TF HE SUCKS" or "OMG DON'T GO TF YOUR GOING TO FEED" or "ALL TF PLAYERS ARE BAD AND THEY ALL FEED" does Twisted Fate have a bad reputation or something among the players?

replies.body:
At full build you can get 1 auto doing over 2000 damage, (ludens, blue card, E, (i use nashors on him but thats a persoanl choice) etc) thats a 1 hit on an adc
and all you need to do 2000 damage again is walk around to charge ludens, auto a few times to get E and wait for W cool down, so its not like an all orb syndra ult combo where the fuckin stars have to align for you to use it. not to mention massive damage on Q as well.

so regardless of reputation he is pretty damn cool
this is the first i have heard of him having a bad reputation tho, i play him a lot and while i don't play ranked too much i have never had complaints when i pick him.
To be good at TF you need to have good map awareness. He is easy to gank, and if you don't use your ult well, you will be useless.

If you are Silver or Bronze, then yes, TF has a bad reputation because all those people do is lose lane then Ult bottom and feed another kill then complain about the team not following up.

You need to have good map awareness and decision making to play TF. Hard to find in Bronze/Silver.
